Title: I Love Frank
Plot: On the bus to a re-start course, Frank has the briefest encounters with a beautiful stranger. Debbie invites some members of the church to stay, but has she got an ulterior motive. And Lillian's assigned to a witness protection programme.
ParentalRatingReason: Violence, offensive language and sex scenes
GuestStars: Esther Coles, Joanne King, George Whitton
